fields.name: Error_head
fields.fieldText: Error: Your role may not request an SE

fields.name: Error_head_0
fields.fieldText:
Error: You cannot request an SE because {!Look_for_open_tech_evals.Owner:User.Full_Name_with_Role__c} is already assigned to this deal.


Click here to open the SE's active Evaluation

fields.name: Error_head_0_0
fields.fieldText: Error: No Technical Evaluation Setting metadata found. Please notify Revenue Operations.

screens.name: Error_May_Not_Create_Tech_Eval
screens.label: Error - May Not Create Tech Eval

fields.name: error_header
fields.fieldText:
Error: You may not create a Technical Evaluation on a closed opportunity.


If you are attempting to back-fill a Technical Evaluation for a recently closed deal, please reach out to Revenue Operations for assistance.

fields.name: request_SE_instructions
fields.fieldText: Opportunity details will be reviewed by SE leadership. Please ensure all required context is added to the opportunity before submitting this request.

fields.name: stage_1_warning
fields.fieldText: WARNING: This deal is not a sales qualified opportunity. Please ensure all relevant qualification details are filled out on the opportunity before submitting this request

fields.name: Please_provide_the_following_information_to_request_an_SE_for_this_deal
fields.fieldText: Please provide the following information to request an SE for this deal:

fields.name: When_is_the_next_customer_meeting
fields.fieldText: When is the next customer meeting? (your local time)

fields.name: Who_is_attending_the_meeting_including_roles
fields.fieldText: Who is attending the meeting? (including roles)

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter fewer than 512 characters

fields.name: What_are_the_meeting_goals_and_exit_criteria
fields.fieldText: What are the meeting goals and exit criteria?

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter fewer than 512 characters

fields.name: Is_there_any_additional_context_we_should_know
fields.fieldText: Is there any additional context we should know?

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter fewer than 512 characters

fields.name: footer_text
fields.fieldText: Click Submit SE Request to notify SE leadership. They will respond to this request within 2 business days.

fields.name: Deal_Details_header
fields.fieldText:
{!recordId.Name}


Details: {!recordId.Account.NumberOfEmployees} emp | {!recordId.Account.Industry} | {!recordId.Segment__c} | {!recordId.Account.ShippingCountry}

Stage: {!recordId.StageName}

Owner: {!recordId.Owner.Full_Name_with_Role__c}

fields.name: manager_se_assignment
fields.fieldText: How would you like to assign an SE to this deal?

fields.name: mapped_se_warning
fields.fieldText: NOTE: Deal owner ({!recordId.Owner.FirstName} {!recordId.Owner.LastName}) is mapped to Sales Engineer ({!recordId.Owner.Mapped_Sales_Engineer__r.FirstName} {!recordId.Owner.Mapped_Sales_Engineer__r.LastName})

value.stringValue: Select a Sales Engineer to assign:

fields.name: success_header
fields.fieldText: Success: A new technical evaluation has been created

textTemplates.name: slack_request
textTemplates.text:
:hammer_and_wrench: New SE Request Submitted :hammer_and_wrench:

{!recordId.Account.Industry} | {!recordId.Account.ShippingCountry} ({!recordId.Account.Shipping_Region__c}) | {!recordId.Account.Segment__c} ({!recordId.Account.NumberOfEmployees} emp.)

Opportunity: {!recordId.Name} | Stage: {!recordId.StageName}

Sales Owner: {!recordId.Owner.Slack_Mention_With_Role_Full_Name__c}

Sales Manager: {!recordId.Owner.Manager.Slack_Mention_With_Role_Full_Name__c}

Forecast ARR: ${!recordId.Forecast_Total_AR__c}


Next Meeting At: {!meeting_time}

Attendees:

```{!new_tech_eval.Next_Meeting_Attendees__c}```

Agenda:

```{!new_tech_eval.Next_Meeting_Agenda__c}```

Goals & Exit Criteria:

```{!new_tech_eval.Next_Meeting_Goals_Exit_Criteria__c}```

Additional Context:

```{!new_tech_eval.Next_Meeting_Additional_Context__c}```
